books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Augusten Burroughs
books.description: Burroughs's post-rehab social life in 1990s New York City, and its eventual happy ending.
books.name: LUST AND WONDER

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Peggy Orenstein
books.description: Interviews with more than 70 teenagers shed light on their experience of sexuality.
books.name: GIRLS AND SEX

books.author: by Christy Beam
books.description: A mother tells the story of her once-sickly daughter, whose chronic ailments disappeared after a near-death experience.
books.name: MIRACLES FROM HEAVEN

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America by The Atlantic's national correspondent; a National Book Award winner.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: The science of productivity, from the author of “The Power of Habit.”
books.name: SMARTER FASTER BETTER

books.author: by Kate Clifford Larson
books.description: The tragic story of the Kennedys’ intellectually disabled oldest daughter.
books.name: ROSEMARY

books.author: by Robert Kolker
books.description: An account of the troubled young Internet prostitutes whose bodies were found in Suffolk County, Long Island, in 2010. Originally published in 2013.
books.name: LOST GIRLS

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The people who saw the real estate crash coming and made billions. Originally published in 2010 and a 2015 movie.
books.name: THE BIG SHORT

books.author: by Jane Mayer
books.description: An account of how the Koch brothers and other super-wealthy donors deployed their money to change American politics.
books.name: DARK MONEY

books.author: by Timothy Egan
books.description: The life of Thomas Francis Meagher, an Irish revolutionary who fled to America and was active in Irish-American politics, becoming the general of New York’s Irish Brigade during the Civil War.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL IRISHMAN
